eu.deustotech.internet.linkedtagworld.lib

Class LinkedTagWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.deustotech.internet.linkedtagworld.lib.LinkedTagWorld

  • public class LinkedTagWorld
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of library. It loads configuration file, gets RDF data and renders Android application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      LinkedTagWorld()
      Default constructor.
      LinkedTagWorld(android.content.Context context, android.app.Activity activity, java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LinkedTagWorld

        public LinkedTagWorld()
        Default constructor. Loads configuration file.

      • LinkedTagWorld

        public LinkedTagWorld(android.content.Context context,
              android.app.Activity activity,
              java.io.InputStream inputStream)
        Constructor. Load configuration file and assigns context, activity and inputStream properties.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the Android Activity where the constructor is called.
        activity - the Android Activity itself.
        inputStream - the InputStream from configuration file.

    • Method Detail

      • renderData

        public void renderData(java.lang.String URI,
              java.lang.String lang)
                throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                       java.lang.InstantiationException,
                       java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException,
                       java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Renders RDF data from URI in corresponding layout.
        Parameters:
        URI - the URI wich contains the RDF resource. It supports 303 redirect, slash URIs, hash URIs and so on.
        lang - the lang to be retrieved from the RDF resource, in ISO 639-1 code format.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
